slts.slt: I know where to introduce myself and ask questions to the DFA Community
I can create a Nami wallet and connect it to the preProd tesnet network
I know where to learn about Deep Funding
I know where to find documentation about funding Rounds and the different Project Pools

modules.title: Getting Started as a Proposer in Deep Funding

slts.slt: I resonate with the vision and mission of the Deep Funding ecosystem
I can write a consistent and eligible proposal
I can design a coherent Milestone Budget

modules.title: Becoming a Reviewer in Deep Funding

slts.slt: I can write a high-quality review of a proposal
I can follow the DFA guidelines when reviewing a proposal
I know the quality standards and Deep Funding mission for proposal eligibility approval

modules.title: Participating in Voting on Deep Funding

slts.slt: I can vote in a Deep Funding Round
I can calculate my voting power on Deep Funding
